meanings.definition: A removable covering for a pillow.
meanings.sent1: I put a clean pillowcase on my pillow every week.
meanings.sent2: The pillowcase matched the bedsheets perfectly.
meanings.sent3: When I tried to wear a pillowcase as a hat, it kept slipping off.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as soft as a freshly washed pillowcase.
meanings.sent5: The pillowcase felt cool and smooth against my cheek.

meanings.definition: To cover or encase with a pillowcase.
meanings.sent1: I will pillowcase the pillows before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: She pillowcased the fluffy pillows with care.
meanings.sent3: He pillowcased his friend in a playful prank.
meanings.sent4: The fog pillowcased the city in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The magician pillowcased the bird in a surprising trick.
